description: Astronomers have detected a dormant black hole with a mass equal to 36 billion Suns in the Cosmic Horseshoe system, 5 billion light-years away. Identified via gravitational lensing and stellar motion, it ranks among the largest known black holes. The discovery sheds light on the link between galaxy size and central black hole growth.
title: Astronomers Detect Black Hole 36 Billion Times the Sun’s Mass, Among Largest Ever Found

description: NASA’s latest wind tunnel tests on a tiltwing model are giving the advanced air mobility industry valuable data to improve air taxi and drone designs. By studying wing and propeller interactions in different conditions, NASA is helping create safer and more efficient next-generation aircraft.
title: NASA Tests Tiltwing Wing Model to Boost Advanced Air Mobility Designs

description: Away in the future, when a mysterious space vessel crashes on the lands of the Earth, a young woman with her fellow tactical soldiers comes to a life-changing discovery that brings them face to face with the Earth's biggest threat. The series is now streaming on Jio Hotstar.
title: Alien Earth Now Streaming on JioHotstar: Everything You Need to Know

description: Light pollution is brightening skies over observatories at an alarming rate, with artificial light growing by up to 10% each year. Astronomers caution that this glow, intensified by widespread LED use and urban expansion, is threatening the ability of telescopes to detect faint cosmic objects and diminishing humanity’s shared right to experience the night sky.
title: Light Pollution Threatens Global Observatories, Jeopardising Deep-Sky Astronomy

description: Mr and Mrs 420 Again Story Given By Naresh Kathooria. This Movie Directed By: Ksshitij Chaudhary and Produced By Rrupaaali Gupta
title: Mr and Mrs 420 Again Now Available for Rent on Amazon Prime Video: What You Need to Know

description: Directed by Justin Kelly, Pretty Thing is an erotic thriller movie that stars Karl Glusman and Alicia Silverstone in the lead roles. The movie revolves around an affair between Sophie and Elliot, which turns into a dark game of obsession, stalking, and threats. Watch now, only on Lionsgate Play.
title: Pretty Thing Now Streaming on Lionsgate Play: Everything You Need to Know About Plot, Cast, and More

description: University of Maryland researchers have designed self-adaptive electrolytes that dynamically expand their stability during charging, enabling safer and faster high-energy batteries. Inspired by the “salting-out” effect, the approach has shown improved performance in both lithium-metal and zinc-metal cells, paving the way for next-generation energy storage solutions.
title: Self-Adaptive Electrolytes Expand Stability for Fast-Charging High-Energy Batteries

description: Sena- Guardians of the Nation is a tale of sacrifice, patriotism and how he prepares to be the best for the country. While his father wants him to have a relaxing career back in California, he opts to be an Army officer, which causes differences between them. The story's climax unfolds when the father and son unite to escape the militants in Kashmir.
title: Sena: Guardians of the Nation is Now Available to Watch on Amazon MX Player

description: The Qubo Dashcam Pro 3K ticks all the right boxes as a great dash camera option for your car. It offers top-notch video quality across various lighting conditions, an excellent companion app, and the brand trust of Qubo, which has been in this space for several years. The slightly higher pricing is the only factor that puts Qubo's latest dash camera into a mix.
title: Qubo Dashcam Pro 3K Review: A Solid Choice for Your Car

description: The Samsung Odyssey OLED G6 is a 27-inch QHD QD-OLED gaming monitor with a 500Hz refresh rate, HDR10+ Gaming, VESA DisplayHDR True Black 500, UL Glare Free coating, and OLED Safeguard+ burn-in protection. Meanwhile, the Samsung Odyssey G7 series includes a 37-inch 4K 165Hz model and a 40-inch 21:9 180Hz model, both with 1000R curvature and 3,000:1 contrast ratio. All models feature multiple gaming enhancements, HDR support, and adjustable stands, with the 40-inch G7 variant offering split-screen modes.
title: Samsung Odyssey OLED G6 Gaming Monitor With 500Hz Refresh Rate Launched Alongside New Odyssey G7 Form Factors

description: Apple has reportedly responded to the allegations made by Elon Musk on Monday, where the billionaire accused the iPhone maker of being biased towards OpenAI’s ChatGPT app. The Cupertino-based tech giant has refuted all allegations and highlighted that apps are ranked on the platform based on algorithms and selection by experts operating with objective criteria.
title: Apple Responds After Elon Musk Alleges Favourism to OpenAI, Says App Store ‘Free of Bias’: Report

description: Samsung began releasing Android 16-based One UI 8 beta for the Galaxy S24 series, Galaxy Z Fold 6 and Galaxy Z Flip 6. The update comes with the August security patch. It includes the firmware versions S926BXXU9ZYH3, S926BOXM9ZYH3, and S926BXXU9CYH3 in the UK.
title: Samsung Galaxy S24 Series, Z Fold 6 and Z Flip 6 Get Android 16-Based One UI 8 Beta Update: Report

description: Acer India announced the launch of a new laptop manufacturing facility in the country on Wednesday. The facility has been constructed in Puducherry, the capital of the Union Territory of Puducherry, located on the southeast coast of India. Acer partnered with Plumage Solutions to expand its domestic manufacturing of IT hardware.
title: Acer India Launches New Laptop Manufacturing Facility in Puducherry, Says Committed to Make in India Mission

description: The Asus NUC 15 Performance is a customisable mini PC powered by Intel Core Ultra 9 275HX or Ultra 7 255HX processors, with up to Nvidia GeForce RTX 5070 or 5060 GPUs. It supports Nvidia DLSS 4, Studio tools, and NIM microservices. The system features three fans, a dual vapour chamber, and improved airflow for quiet, efficient cooling. It supports up to five displays, offers Wi-Fi 7 and Bluetooth 5.4 connectivity, comes without OS, RAM, or SSD, and uses a 330W external adaptor.
title: Asus NUC 15 Performance Mini PC With Up to Intel Core Ultra 9 CPU, Nvidia GeForce RTX 50 Series GPUs Launched

description: Realme P4 5G series is scheduled to debut in India soon. The company has been teasing the specifications of the handset for days. Now, the Chinese smartphone maker has teased the camera configuration of the upcoming Realme P4 5G and P4 Pro 5G. The handsets will be available in India via Flipkart. Recently, a company executive hinted that the company might not launch an Ultra model as part of the Realme P4 5G series.
title: Realme P4 5G Series Camera Specifications Revealed Ahead of India Launch

description: Google is reportedly working on improving the Canvas feature within Gemini’s Android app. As per the report, the Mountain View-based tech giant is expanding the functionality of Canvas, allowing users to create different kinds of content formats and even an app within the sandbox-style interface. If true, this new functionality will substantially enhance the overall experience users get via the tool.
title: Google Reportedly Working on Adding Support for Full-Range of Canvas Tools in Gemini’s Android App

description: Infinix Hot 60i 5G’s launch in India was recently confirmed by the company. The phone will be sold via an e-commerce platform and the company’s official website. Additionally, the upcoming handset will be offered in four colour options. Now, the company has announced the date for its India debut.
title: Infinix Hot 60i 5G India Launch Date Confirmed; Company Teases Key Specifications

description: The Perseid meteor shower, one of the year’s most anticipated celestial events, will peak on the night of August 12–13, 2025. At its height, the shower can produce up to 100 meteors per hour, though the glare of an 86% waning gibbous moon will make spotting faint streaks difficult. Observers can still expect to see the brightest meteors and occasional fireballs, especially after midnight.
title: Perseid Meteor Shower 2025 to Dazzle Night Sky in August

description: Redmi Note 15 Pro+, set to launch in China in August, is tipped to feature a Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 SoC, just like the Redmi Note 14 Pro+ 5G. It is expected to get a quad-curved 1.5K display, a 7,000mAh battery, and dual 50-megapixel rear cameras, including main and telephoto shooters. It may be the first Redmi phone to support BeiDou’s short message satellite communication.
title: Redmi Note 15 Pro+ to Feature the Same Chipset as Last Year's Redmi Note 14 Pro+, Tipster Claims

description: Vivo Vision will be launched in China this month, the company announced on Tuesday. The mixed reality headset was first unveiled at the Boao Forum for Asia Annual Conference 2025 in March. Its design closely resembles the Apple Vision Pro, featuring a larger visor on the front and a thick headband at the back. While it will not go on sale this year, Vivo confirmed that it will set up experience zones at offline centres, enabling consumers to experience the mixed reality headset.
title: Vivo Vision Mixed Reality Headset With ‘Ultra Lightweight Design’ Set for China Launch on August 21

description: Vivo X300 allegedly appeared on the Radio Certification website in China. While the certification doesn't mention any specifications of the device, it suggests that the launch is approaching. It is said to be associated with model numbers V2502A and V2502DA.
title: Vivo X300 Listings on China's Radio Certification Agency Website Hint at Imminent Launch

description: Flipkart Freedom Sale 2025 is in full swing. Starting today, customers can get various electronics, such as phones, smartwatches, tablets, wearables, laptops, TVs, and home appliances, with bank discounts, exchange bonuses, and additional cashback offers. The company is also allowing people to opt for easy EMIs and get exchange bonuses on top of the bank offer.
title: Flipkart Freedom Sale: Check Deals On Oppo Phones Including Oppo K13 5G, Reno 14 5G, and More

description: Flipkart Freedom Sale 2025 started in India with an array of discounts on the latest iPhone 16 and iPhone 15 models. Flipkart has partnered with different banks to offer payment discounts for customers. There are exchange discounts and no-cost EMI deals.
title: Flipkart Freedom Sale: iPhone 16 Pro Max, iPhone 16, iPhone 15 and More Available at Discounted Prices

description: Google Search added a new feature on Tuesday that allows users to select publications as their preferred source. The feature enables users to see news and articles from their favourite or go-to publishers more frequently. We, at Gadgets 360, have been bringing you the latest news and information about a wide range of consumer tech devices, the latest rundown on new and upcoming games, and breaking down cutting-edge technologies such as artificial intelligence (AI) and cybersecurity.
title: Gadgets 360 Can Now Be Added as Your Preferred Source in Google Search: Here’s How to Do It

description: LinkedIn launched a new game, Mini Sudoku, on its professional social networking platform on Tuesday. The game, which is a modern take on the classic puzzle, is available to all users. It also marks the sixth entry in the platform’s gaming catalogue, a new service which started in May 2024.
title: LinkedIn Launches Mini Sudoku Game as the Sixth Entry to Its Gaming Catalogue

description: Flipkart Freedom Day Sale is now live, offering bank offers, exchange bonuses, and cashback offers to customers on a variety of electronics, such as phones, smartwatches, tablets, wearables, laptops, TVs, home appliances, and other gadgets. People can even grab the flagship Samsung Galaxy S-series handset at a discounted price while the sale event is live.
title: Flipkart Freedom Day Sale: Best Deals On Samsung Galaxy S24 FE, Galaxy A35 5G, and More Samsung Smartphones

description: Flipkart Freedom Sale 2025 is currently live in India with attractive offers on smart TVs across different price segments. Flipkart has teamed up with select lenders to provide instant discounts of up to Rs. 5,000 on their card purchases. Further, there are EMI offers and exchange discounts.
title: Flipkart Freedom Day Sale: Best Discounts on Smart TVs From Samsung, LG, Sony, and More

description: Flipkart’s Independence Day Sale 2025, running from August 13 to August 17, is offering discounts on products from appliances to gadgets. Notably, the event is inconsistently named across the site, with banners calling it the “Freedom Sale.” Shoppers can enjoy extra perks like bank offers, coupons, and exchange discounts. HSBC, Canara Bank, and Yes Bank users get up to Rs. 5,000 off, while select cards offer 5 percent cashback. Here, we have compiled the top laptop deals.
title: Flipkart Freedom Day Sale: Top Discounts and Offers on Laptops From Samsung, Acer, Lenovo and More

description: Google Pixel 10 series will be launched at the Made by Google event on August 20. Ahead of the anticipated debut, the pricing of all the models in the Pixel 10 lineup for the Indian market is said to have been leaked. As per a report, the Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10 Pro XL, and the Pixel 10 Pro Fold will not receive a price hike compared to last year’s models.
title: Google Pixel 10 Series Price in India Reportedly Leaked Ahead of August 20 Launch

description: The FASTag Annual Pass will be introduced for commuters in India on August 15, marking the 79th Independence Day. It can be purchased with a one-time payment for non-commercial private cars, jeeps, and vans. From price and benefits to a step-by-step guide on how to buy, here is everything you need to know about the FASTag Annual Pass.
title: FASTag Annual Pass: How to Apply This Independence Day, a Step-by-Step Guide

description: Flipkart Freedom Sale 2025 kicked off in India on Wednesday (August 13). It offers lucrative deals on a wide range of products across categories. Buyers can avail discounts and other offers on handsets from top brands such as Apple, Motorola, Nothing, Oppo, and Samsung. Here are the best smartphone deals you can grab during the Flipkart Freedom Sale 2025.
title: Flipkart Freedom Sale: Deals on Samsung Galaxy S24, iPhone 16, Motorola Edge 60 Fusion Announced

description: Lenovo Tab has been launched in India as the latest entry-level tablet from the Chinese technology firm. The new Android tablet runs on the MediaTek Helio G85 chipset, coupled with 4GB of RAM. It has a 10.1-inch display with full-HD resolution and a 60Hz refresh rate. The Lenovo Tab packs a 5,100mAh battery with 15W charging support.
title: Lenovo Tab With MediaTek Helio G85 SoC, 5,100mAh Battery Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Microsoft Edge users will now be shown a prompt on top of the webpage when they download the Google Chrome web browser. The tech giant highlighted that both web browsers use the same technology, simultaneously claiming that Edge comes with added Windows protection. This could be an attempt to get more people to use its native browser.
title: Microsoft Edge to Target Heavy Google Chrome Users With More Persuasive Prompts: Report

description: OpenAI is finally bringing back the GPT-4o artificial intelligence (AI) model to ChatGPT, after retiring it last week. The San Francisco-based AI firm removed the older model after the launch of the GPT-5 model, highlighting that the new frontier model can handle both reasoning and conversational tasks. However, many users took to social media platforms to highlight that they preferred 4o’s responses more than GPT-5’s.
title: OpenAI Brings GPT-4o AI Model Back to ChatGPT after User Complaints, Revises GPT-5 Thinking Rate Limits

description: The Poco M7 Plus 5G features a 6.9-inch full-HD+ display with a 144Hz refresh rate and triple TÜV Rheinland certifications. It is powered by a Snapdragon 6s Gen 3 SoC with up to 8GB RAM, and ships with Android 15-based HyperOS 2.0 with two years of OS upgrades. It has a 50-megapixel dual rear camera setup, an 8-megapixel front camera, and a 7,000mAh battery with 33W charging and 18W reverse charging support.
title: Poco M7 Plus 5G Launched in India With 7,000mAh Battery, Snapdragon 6s Gen 3 SoC: Price, Specifications

description: The Honor Magic V Flip 2 will launch in China on August 21. It will come in blue, grey, purple, and white shades, with the sparkling blue variant designed by Prof. Jimmy Choo. The clamshell foldable features an edge-to-edge cover display, dual rear cameras, and a slim-bezel inner screen. The handset may include a Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 SoC, a 6.8-inch inner and 4-inch cover LTPO displays, a 50-megapixel main sensor, a 5,500mAh battery, and 80W fast charging.
title: Honor Magic V Flip 2 Launch Date Set for August 21; Design, Colour Options Revealed

description: Vijay Sales is selling the base 128GB storage variant of the iPhone 14 for Rs. 51,900. The e-commerce website is offering additional cashback for customers purchasing the handset using select debit and credit cards and EMI transactions. Buyers can also avail of no-cost EMI offers and exchange discounts.
title: iPhone 14 Price in India Drops to All-Time Low on Vijay Sales: Price, Specifications

description: The Google Pixel 10 series is scheduled to be unveiled at the Made by Google event on August 20. With almost a week to go, the Mountain View, California-based tech giant has taken wraps off of the upcoming book-style foldable handset in its lineup, ubiquitously known as the Pixel 10 Pro Fold. Google has teased the design of the phone in a new video and it does not appear to be too different from the current Pixel 9 Pro Fold.
title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold Design Officially Teased Ahead of Launch on August 20

description: Elon Musk, the Founder of xAI, and Sam Altman, the Co-Founder and CEO of OpenAI, were involved in a battle of words on Monday. The incident started after Musk accused Apple of favouring the iOS app of ChatGPT by ranking it first in the App Store’s various sections while not mentioning X (formerly known as Twitter) or Grok in its Must-Have list and editorial sections.
title: Elon Musk vs Sam Altman: AI Founders Tangled in War of Words Over Claims of Favourism: 5 Things to Know

description: Artificial intelligence (AI) startup Perplexity on Tuesday launched an audacious bid to buy the Google Chrome browser in its entirety, according to a report. The Aravind Srinivas-led company is said to have offered Google $34.5 billion (roughly Rs. 3.02 lakh crore) for the rights to the world’s most popular web browser, a sum which is even higher than Perplexity’s own valuation.
title: Perplexity Reportedly Offers to Buy Google Chrome for More Than Its Own Valuation

description: India is all set to celebrate its 79th Independence Day on August 15. The Independence Day 2025, just like previous years, will witness a grand celebration at the national capital, Delhi’s Red Fort. The annual event typically kicks off with the unfurling of the tricolour flag, followed by a PM Narendra Modi’s address to the nation. While the entire event is broadcast live on television channels and YouTube, many prefer to attend the celebrations in person.
title: Independence Day 2025: How to Book Tickets to Watch PM Modi's Speech
